title: The Royal Vaibhavam: Diamond and Emerald Grand Bridal Necklace Set
materials: 5 stones). Features Hyderabadi Kundan setting with a fine gold finish.
features: This magnificent bridal necklace set features intricate filigree work ('Jali' work) with diamond-studded floral and paisley motifs. The choker (Kanthi) sits elegantly on the neck, transitioning into a longer, elaborate haaram. Features a stylized peacock motif ('Mayura' design) at the center of the haaram, symbolizing beauty and grace. Dangler drops with small gold beads add movement and charm. Upper part D.wt:-8.00(462) and Ruby:-0.021(1)
colors: Predominantly gold with the sparkling brilliance of diamonds
accented by the rich green of emeralds and a hint of ruby red. Creates a regal and luxurious color palette perfect for bridal wear.
occasions: Ideal for grand occasions like weddings (muhurtham)
and significant cultural events. Its majestic design also makes it a statement piece for high-profile galas and celebrations.
description: A testament to exquisite South Indian craftsmanship, this necklace set embodies timeless elegance. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and rubies signifies prosperity and good fortune, making it a treasured heirloom. The intricate design reflects a legacy of artistry and is sure to captivate attention. Perfect for the bride who wants to make a lasting impression.
